LanguageData.lowValue.label: Powerdraw when unused in Watts
LanguageData.lowValue.tooltip: How many Watts should be consumed when the building is idle?
LanguageData.highMultiplier.label: Power multiplier when in use
LanguageData.highMultiplier.tooltip: How much should the original powerdraw be multiplied with?
LanguageData.doorMultiplier.label: Power multiplier for autodoors
LanguageData.doorMultiplier.tooltip: How much should the original powerdraw be multiplied with when in use (opening/closing)?
LanguageData.verboseLogging.label: Verbose logging
LanguageData.verboseLogging.tooltip: Will show all powerlevels in the log at startup
LanguageData.blockUseWhenLowPower.label: Block use on low power
LanguageData.blockUseWhenLowPower.tooltip: Will block the use of workbenches if the power generation is too low to support it and there is not enough saved electricity.
LanguageData.applyRepowerVanilla.label: Apply built-in power-settings from the original RePower-mod
LanguageData.applyRepowerVanilla.tooltip: The RePower-mod had default values for the Crematorium, Smelter and the High-Tech Research Bench, increasing the high and low value for these buildnings independent of the above settings.
LanguageData.notEnoughPower.failreason: There is not enough power available (needs {0}{1})
